data.name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life
data.detailed_description:
This is the story of two people who meet in a completely unreal situation.
It's a story about a journey that is very frightening at first view, but very rewarding - because at the end of the journey the unfortunate traveler is waiting for a prize.
Learn about their adventures in modern Japan in 2018.


FEATURES

- Detailed backdrops.
- A fun Isekai story about a great love story.
- Music by Denis Stelmakh, a popular composer in the neo-classical genre.
data.about_the_game:
This is the story of two people who meet in a completely unreal situation.
It's a story about a journey that is very frightening at first view, but very rewarding - because at the end of the journey the unfortunate traveler is waiting for a prize.

data.short_description: Kyoko's life has turned to hell. Every day she comes home and doesn't know how to escape her thoughts. She feels so bad that she starts to think about suicide. But one day she finds a notebook at home, scribbled in the hand of a man close to her. A small visual novel about big love.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
